x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description:
Save legacy dashboards permissions > Give read access to all the entities (groups, users and roles) which are currently defined in pa_dashboards >> Give pa_viewer and pa_contributor - view rights to the existing dashboards >> Give pa_admin and pa_power_user – write and delete rights to the existing dashboards
>>> If the dashboardbelongs to a group and there are no permissions defined on the pa_dashboards and pa_dashboards_group tables, then * we transfer pa_viewer and pa_contributor roles to pa_dashboard_group and we give pa_power_user and pa_admin role, writting access to pa_dashboards. * Else we give pa_viewer and pa_contributor read access on pa_dashboards and pa_power_user and pa_admin writting access on the same table - pa_dashboards.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Save legacy dashboards permissions

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_d5c633cc83e89e50c6695855eeaad391
